events.restart: if type osascript; then osascript -e 'display notification "Restarting..." with title "nodemon"' ; fi
events.start: if type osascript; then osascript -e 'display notification "Restarted Successfully!!" with title "nodemon"' ; fi
events.crash: if type osascript; then osascript -e 'display notification "App Crash!!!" with title "nodemon"' ; fi
